Subject.title: Subject
Subject.description: Represents a single academic subject for attendance tracking.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this subject.

Integration.title: Integration
Integration.description: Stores credentials for a third-party integration, like Google.

expiresAt.description: The timestamp when the access token expires.

Vector.title: Vector
Vector.description: Represents a text chunk and its vector embedding for RAG.

text.description: The text content of the chunk.

embedding.description: The vector embedding of the text chunk.

courseId.description: The ID of the course this vector belongs to.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this vector.

/subjects/{subjectId}.description: Stores the attendance tracking subjects for all users.

/users/{userId}/integrations/{integratio.description: Stores third-party integration credentials for a user.

/study_material_vectors/{vectorId}.description: Stores text chunks and their vector embeddings for RAG.
